message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make a budget work here.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,200,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. This takes into account your budget concerns and allows for a mutually beneficial deal. Let me know if you're interested in closing this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
